import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import logo from '../assets/img/Logos.png' import api from '../services/api' import moment from 'moment-timezone' export default function AtendimentoPage() { const [agendamentos, setAgendamentos] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function loadAgendamentos() { const response = await api.get(`/getAgendamentos`) setAgendamentos(response.data) } loadAgendamentos() }) return ( <>
